report.title: Branch sites list for EBMS
report.description: Lists sites and count of samples/species.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false JOIN location_attribute_values vUserLink ON vUserLink.location_id=l.id AND vUserLink.location_attribute_id=#user_link_attr_id# AND vUserLink.deleted = FALSE AND vUserLink.int_value = #user_id# LEFT JOIN samples sp ON sp.location_id=l.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o ON parent_sample_id=sp.id #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND l.deleted=false

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

column.name: samples_this_year
column.sql: SUM(CASE WHEN extract(year from sp.date_start)=extract(year from now()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
